simulation.tcp

Class SenderNewReno

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.tcp.Sender
      • simulation.tcp.SenderReno
        • simulation.tcp.SenderNewReno
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimedComponent

    public class SenderNewReno
extends SenderReno
    The NewReno version of the TCP sender was described in RFC 2581 and clarified in RFC 3782.
    This is a highly simplified version of NewReno sender, which is currently specified in RFC 5681.

    This class does not implement any code. It just serves to help the SenderStateFastRecovery to know in which context it is running (old Reno or NewReno) and to behave accordingly.

    Author:
    Ivan Marsic
    See Also:
    SenderReno, SenderStateFastRecovery
